summary: Resolved conflict in index.html by preserving the red background feature from the feature branch while incorporating beneficial styling improvements from main (min-height instead of height, and font-size: 3rem for the h1 element)
strategyUsed: Feature preservation with enhancement integration: kept red background (#FF0000) and 'Simple Spaghetti Website' title from feature branch, merged in min-height viewport and 3rem font-size from main branch for improved responsiveness and styling
